title: The Detective and the Investor: Uncovering Investment Techniques from the Legendary Sleuths
description: The Detective and the Investor offers a unique approach to investing from internationally acclaimed and best-selling author Robert Hagstrom. In this fascinating book, Hagstrom combines intelligent investment techniques with the best detective fiction, allowing investors to learn a great deal by observing the methods and the mental habits of the great detectives.
author: Robert G. Hagstrom
